overview:
Andrew Brown is author of the bestselling technical thriller, The Church of Anonymous.

In the summer of 2011, he worked at Rapportive in San Francisco, CA. He is currently a research assistant for Dr. Daniel Tauritz in the Virtual Facilitator project.

He is currently enrolled at Missouri University of Science & Technology, and plans to graduate in 2013 with a Bachelors in Computer Science, a minor in Cognitive Neuroscience, and an emphasis in Artificial Intelligence.
